participant_2.background:
I am 7 foot tall.
I just graduated college.
I am hoping to play.
I am hoping to play basketball overseas.
I recently had knee surgery.

content.text: Nice to meet you, (User 2). What do you do?
I just graduated from college and I'm hoping to play basketball overseas.
That's really cool! How tall are you?
Wow! That's impressive. Are you from a tall family?
No, I'm the only tall one in my family.
That's even more impressive. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play basketball, of course, but I also like to read and play video games.
Me too! I love to read and play video games. What are some of your favorite books and video games?

I'm really into fantasy novels right now. I just finished reading The Name of the Wind by Patrick Rothfuss and I'm starting on The Way of Kings by Brandon Sanderson. For video games, I'm really into League of Legends and Fortnite.
I've heard good things about The Name of the Wind. I've never played League of Legends or Fortnite, but I've heard they're both really popular.
They are. I'm addicted to them both.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great day!
